## harp-omv-datasource package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ComposedDataFilter](./harp-omv-datasource.composeddatafilter.md) | An \[\[OmvFeatureFilter\]\] implementation that delegates all filter decision returning <code>true</code> for any predicate if all delegates return <code>true</code>. |
|  [GeoJsonDataProvider](./harp-omv-datasource.geojsondataprovider.md) | GeoJson \[\[DataProvider\]\]. Automatically handles tiling and simplification of static GeoJson. |
|  [OmvDataSource](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasource.md) |  |
|  [OmvDebugLabelsTile](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdebuglabelstile.md) |  |
|  [OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.md) | Builds an <code>OmvFilterDescription</code> (internal type) that specifies an \[\[OmvFeatureFilter\]\] as well as an \[\[OmvFeatureModifier\]\]. |
|  [OmvGenericFeatureFilter](./harp-omv-datasource.omvgenericfeaturefilter.md) | <code>OmvFeatureFilter</code> implementation that uses a <code>OmvFeatureFilterDescription</code> to filter <code>TileData</code> features before they are completely decoded. |
|  [OmvGenericFeatureModifier](./harp-omv-datasource.omvgenericfeaturemodifier.md) | <code>OmvFeatureModifier</code> implementation that uses a <code>OmvFeatureFilterDescription</code> to filter <code>TileData</code> features before they are completely decoded. |
|  [OmvRestClient](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclient.md) | REST client supporting getting protobuf OMV Tile from REST-based servers. |
|  [OmvTile](./harp-omv-datasource.omvtile.md) |  |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AuthenticationMethodInfo](./harp-omv-datasource.authenticationmethodinfo.md) |  |
|  [GeoJsonDataProviderOptions](./harp-omv-datasource.geojsondataprovideroptions.md) |  |
|  [LinesGeometry](./harp-omv-datasource.linesgeometry.md) |  |
|  [OmvDataSourceParameters](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdatasourceparameters.md) |  |
|  [OmvDecoderOptions](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.md) | Internal interface for options passed from the \[\[OmvDataSource\]\] to the decoder. |
|  [OmvFeatureFilter](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilter.md) | The <code>OmvFeatureFilter</code> is designed to work in an <code>OmvVisitor</code>/<code>visitOmv</code> combination (for example, <code>OmvDecoder</code>). Returning <code>false</code> from any of the calls terminates processing of that layer or feature.<!-- -->The <code>OmvFeatureFilter</code> is an "early-opt-out" filter, which cannot filter individual features, because at that point the features are not really decoded. Use the \[\[OmvFeatureModifier\]\] to filter for individual features. |
|  [OmvFeatureFilterDescription](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescription.md) | Internal type of a complete \[\[OmvFeatureFilter\]\] description, should not be publicly available. |
|  [OmvFeatureModifier](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturemodifier.md) | The <code>OmvFeatureModifier</code> can be used to filter individual features. It gets passed in the \[\[Env\]\] of the feature, which contains all the values that can be searched for in a style. If a filter function returns false, the feature is ignored, and no geometry is being created.<!-- -->In addition to pure filtering, the <code>OmvFeatureModifier</code> can also modify the \[\[Env\]\] of the feature, or even add new properties to the feature, for example, traffic states. The <code>OmvFeatureModifier</code> is executed before the styles are selected, so the geometry is created with the modified feature properties. |
|  [OmvFilterDescription](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfilterdescription.md) | Internal type of a single filter description, Should not be publicly available. |
|  [OmvFilterFeatureAttribute](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfilterfeatureattribute.md) | Definition of a filter for a feature attribute |
|  [OmvFilterString](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfilterstring.md) | Definition of a filter. |
|  [OmvLayerFilterDescription](./harp-omv-datasource.omvlayerfilterdescription.md) | Internal type of a layer filter description, Should not be publicly available. |
|  [OmvRestClientParameters](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.md) |  |
|  [OmvTileFactory](./harp-omv-datasource.omvtilefactory.md) |  |
